title: Problem Concerning Lux's spells
body:
To put it simply. the hitboxes are next to broken. The q is worse than Morgana's bind's range, and the circle indicator is absolutely stupid.

I propose at least making Lux's circle thing indicator the same as Gragas' because I can actually see Gragas' and it pops up faster.

Also the q hitbox e.e

Edit: more words

replies.body:
The bind is pretty accurate most of the time but I know what you mean with her E. Ult can also be pretty dodgy on occasion.

On another note, invisible Nidalee spears are back. Hooray!
have they fixed the invisible e for lux yet
